stimulusHtml: Two positive point charges, one with charge +Q and one with charge +2Q, are fixed in place a distance d from each other. Which of the following statements is correct about the electric field due to the two point charges?
choicesHtml: The electric field is zero at the midpoint between the two point charges.
The electric field is zero at a location between the point charges and closer to the one of charge Q.
The electric field is zero at a location between the point charges and closer to the one of charge 2Q.
The electric field will not be zero at any location between the two point charges.
